lrc.lyric:
[by:Frankie阿祖]
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Samuel Shetty/Akanksha Nandrekar
[00:00.693] 作词 : Manoj Kumar Nath
[00:02.80]Tere naam se hi roshan mera hai jahaan
[00:11.73]Tere sath se hi raatein meri hain subah
[00:27.37]Ow........
[00:35.45]Mm........
[00:39.65]Honge juda na hum tum se tum se
[00:47.36]Aur kahein kya hum tum se tum se
[00:54.69]Tere naam se hi roshan mera hai jahaan
[01:02.44]Tere sath se hi raatein meri hain subah
[01:11.60]Honge juda na hum tum se tum se
[01:19.41]Aur kahein kya hum
[01:27.53]Tu dastaan koi tu hai koi ek nazm sa
[01:35.47]Sunta rahun tujhe main ab sham-o-subah
[01:43.44]Dil ka sukoon tu hi marham har marz ka
[01:51.35]Tujh bin katey nahi ek pal bhi ab mera
[01:58.95]Tere naam se hi roshan mera hai jahaan
[02:06.40]Tere sath se hi raatein meri hain subah
[02:15.56]Honge juda na hum tum se tum se
[02:23.39]Aur kahein kya hum tum se tum se
[02:47.63]Mera safar hai tu tu mera karwaan
[02:55.42]Ab har manzil tu hi tu hi hai rasta
[03:03.37]Aisa hua asar yeh tere ishq ka
[03:11.36]Dastak teri suney toh dhadke dil mera
[03:18.93]Tere naam se hi roshan mera hai jahaan
[03:26.36]Tere sath se hi raatein meri hain subah
[03:35.41]Honge juda na hum tum se tum se
[03:43.29]Aur kahein kya hum tum se tum se
[03:51.28]Honge juda na hum tum se tum se
[03:59.24]Aur kahein kya hum tum se tum se
